long_description: The stretch-woven Salomon Field Pants are waterproof for hiking through wet foliage or spring snow, yet they don't sacrifice breathability. 3 types of nylon fabric are positioned to optimize windproof and waterproof protection, stretch, breathability, and UPF 50+ sun protection. Lined waistband with snap closure provides comfort. Internal belt lets you adjust the fit. Articulated knees and gusseted crotch allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. Salomon Field Pants for men offer open hand pockets and one rear pocket. Pant-leg hems adjust to seal out weather.
short_description: The stretch-woven Salomon Field Pants are waterproof for hiking through wet foliage or spring snow, yet they don't sacrifice breathability.
